nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.forc: Whether the server translates the text when sending or the client translates
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.shut: Message sent when the server shuts down
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.quer: Whether the query protocol displays plugin information
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.depr: Whether to prompt for deprecated events for plugin
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.asyn: Number of threads used by the server scheduler, 'auto' means automatic allocation
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.inst: Whether to install the Spark plugin on the server
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.wate: Whether to enable WaterdogPE compatibility mode on the server
nukkit.server.settings.baseSettings.save: Whether to save unknown blocks, such as custom blocks that are not registered
nukkit.server.settings.networkSettings.c: Compression level of the compression algorithm used by the server
nukkit.server.settings.networkSettings.z:
Zlib compression algorithm provider used by the server. 0 for Java's original algorithm
 1 for single-threaded low memory usage algorithm
 2 for multi-threaded caching algorithm
 3 for hardware-accelerated algorithm
nukkit.server.settings.networkSettings.s: Whether the server uses Snappy compression (not recommended)
nukkit.server.settings.networkSettings.m: Maximum number of bytes the server can decompress
nukkit.server.settings.networkSettings.p: Maximun number of packet per seconds
nukkit.server.settings.debugSettings.lev: Server's debug level [INFO, DEBUG, TRACE, ALL]
nukkit.server.settings.debugSettings.ign: Ignored packet logs at TRACE level
nukkit.server.settings.levelSettings.aut: Whether the server dynamically adjusts the tick rate
nukkit.server.settings.chunkSettings.per: Maximum number of chunks sent to players per tick
nukkit.server.settings.chunkSettings.spa: Number of chunks a player needs to receive upon first spawn
nukkit.server.settings.chunkSettings.cle: Whether to clear the tick list at the end of each tick
nukkit.server.settings.chunkSettings.gen: Maximum number of terrain generation tasks executed simultaneously
nukkit.server.settings.freezearray.enabl: Whether to enable the freeze array
nukkit.server.settings.playersettings.sk: Cooldown time for players changing skins
nukkit.server.settings.playersettings.fo: Whether to force trust player skins, allowing players to use third-party skins freely

commands.tellraw.error.scoreNameNotStrin: le champ de nom dans le champ de score doit être une chaîne. Exemple : « "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}] »
commands.tellraw.error.scoreNotObject: le champ de score en texte brut doit contenir un objet. Exemple : « "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}] »
commands.tellraw.error.scoreObjectiveNot: le champ d'objectif dans le champ de score doit être une chaîne. Exemple : « "rawtext":[{"score": {"name": "my_name", "objective": "my_objective"}}] »

commands.tellraw.error.textNotString: Le champ de texte en texte brut doit contenir une chaîne. Exemple : "rawtext":[{"text": "text to display"}]
commands.tellraw.error.translateNotStrin: Le champ de traduction en texte brut doit une clé de langue. Exemple : "rawtext":[{"translate": "gui.ok"}]
commands.tellraw.error.withNotArrayOrRaw: le champ « avec » en texte brut doit contenir un tableau ou un autre objet en texte brut. Exemple 1 : "rawtext":[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with": [ "value1", "value2" ]}]  Exemple 2 : "rawtext":[{"translate": "chat.type.announcement", "with":{"rawtext":[{"text": "value1"}, {"text": "value2"}]}}]
